org.usfirst.frc.team3997.robot.hardware

Class RemoteControl

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.usfirst.frc.team3997.robot.hardware.RemoteControl
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    ControlBoard

    public abstract class RemoteControl
extends java.lang.Object
    Abstract class for all input for robot functionality
